## Importation des données

```{r}

grd2 <- import(here("data/pasec/tg_grd2.dta")) |> as_tibble()

grd6 <- import(here("data/pasec/tg_grd6.dta")) |> as_tibble()

head(grd6)

```






```{r}
grd2_design <- grd2 |> 
  as_survey_design(weights = rwgt0)

grd6_design <- grd6 |> 
  as_survey_design(weights = rwgt0)


grd2_design

```






```{r}
grd2_design <- grd2 |> 
  as_survey_rep(weights = rwgt0,repweights = rwgt1:rwgt45,type = "JK1",mse = TRUE,combined.weights = FALSE, scale = (45-1)/45)

grd6_design <- grd6 |> 
  as_survey_rep(weights = rwgt0,repweights = rwgt1:rwgt45,type = "JK1",mse = TRUE,combined.weights = FALSE, scale = (45-1)/45)



```
